properties.areaDesc: Newton; Jasper; Spalding; Monroe; Butts; Henry; Lamar
properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 13 at 12:16AM EST by NWS Peachtree City GA
properties.description:
At 1215 AM EST...a strong thunderstorm was near Chappel Mill, or 7
miles east of Griffin...moving northeast at 30 mph.

HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind...frequent cloud to ground lightning
and heavy rain.

IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of
light...unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary
street flooding especially in poor drainage areas.

Some locations in the path of this storm include
Griffin, Jackson, Monticello, Locust Grove, Flovilla, Milner,
Jenkinsburg, Orchard Hill, East Griffin, Stewart, Turtle Cove,
Worthville, Walker Mill, McKibben, Chappel Mill, High Falls State
Park, Blount, Eudora, Liberty Hill and North Alcovy.
properties.instruction:
People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear
thunder...you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists
should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to
hydroplaning.

LAT...LON 3309 8417 3325 8428 3355 8383 3326 8363
TIME...MOT...LOC 0515Z 240DEG 26KT 3321 8415

WIND...40MPH

NWSheadline: SIGNIFICANT WEATHER ADVISORY FOR BUTTS...NORTHEASTERN LAMAR... NORTHERN MONROE...WESTERN JASPER...EASTERN SPALDING...SOUTHERN NEWTON AND SOUTHEASTERN HENRY COUNTIES UNTIL 100 AM EST
